title: ABOUT ME
introductionParagraph1: Greetings! As a <0>proficient front-end developer</0>, I take pride in crafting <1>pixel-perfect UIs</1>. With extensive knowledge in modern frameworks, I ensure responsiveness across all devices. My dedication is evident in every line of code, ensuring optimal performance and user experience.
introductionParagraph2: Collaborating closely with design and backend teams, I <0>bridge the gap</0> to bring visions to life. Leveraging the <1>latest web technologies</1>, I'm always at the forefront of the digital landscape. My code is clean, maintainable, and in line with the best industry practices.
